game.name: Space Digger Red Beard
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Go down the mine, gather enough resources, and return back to the surface. Make sure that you don't run out of oxygen on your way! Plan every move on the grid carefully, only by returning safely can you progress and uncover even greater rewards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Go down the mine, gather enough resources, and return back to the surface. Make sure that you don't run out of oxygen on your way! Plan every move on the grid carefully, only by returning safely can you progress and uncover even greater rewards.
